title: S16 Ep150: How To Receive Your Holiday Miracle and Keep Getting Them All Year Long w/ Barry Shore
itunes:title: How To Receive Your Holiday Miracle and Keep Getting Them All Year Long w/ Barry Shore
description:
During the Christmas Season, everyone likes a good old fashioned miracle to make the season that much brighter! But, what if every day you woke up and you had not just one miracle happen, but potentially MANY?

Barry Shore joins Darkness Radio today to talk about not just holiday miracles but how you can start receiving miracles yourself every day! Barry himself is a literal walking miracle as he is a former quadriplegic who now swims two miles a day and around the world! 

Get ready to be entertained, educated, and inspired in today's holiday episode!

Barry also has a free gift for all listeners of this program as well!  Just go to his website and watch the videos there:  barryshore.com/

Get copies of Barry's Book, "The Joy of Living", here: amazon.com/dp/B094Q7VRXG
